attributes.action: Arm the police, protect us and them!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: From the outside world we must look like easy pickings, more and more gangs are coming to the uk, the police are in most case's helpless when faced with a armed person(s), i myself dont like the idea of the police carrying guns but i think its what is being forced onto us, go one step better than the usa by keeping the ban on guns and arm the police!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
